suggested_topics.fancy_title: 33: Minion Proposal - take 2! Market buy of weTH - 20,000 DAI for at least 4.9 wETH

suggested_topics.title: 46: Member Proposal - Delleon request for social media management
suggested_topics.fancy_title: 46: Member Proposal - Delleon request for social media management

posts.cooked:
I want to be in the DAO because I enjoy participating in experiments where there is a chance to change a long standing way of doing things for the better. Experiments like this are the only way to discover a higher local maximum in the coordination terrain. I want to learn about the process of community management and see what happens when a community is given a chance to take ownership of something that has traditionally been a more top-down broadcasted process.

I’d like to be a part of this if you’ll have me.
